post.summary: Create a custom role in tenant

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Control which fields are included in the response to optimize payload size.

**When fields parameter is provided:**
Only explicitly specified fields are returned. All response fields become optional.

**Examples:**
- `?fields=id,name,permissions_count` - Include id, name, and count (no permissions array)
- `?fields=permissions_count,last_modified` - Include only count and timestamp

201.description: The request has succeeded and a new resource has been created as a result.

400.description: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.

Cursor.description:
Cursor for cursor-based pagination.
An opaque string that points to the next/previous page of results.

limit.description: Limit of returned objects. Use -1 to return all objects.

FieldMask.description:
Field mask used by the `fields` query parameter to control which fields
are included in the response.

**Syntax:**
- Use comma to separate multiple fields: `id,name,description`
- Use parentheses for nested objects: `subject(id,name),resource(type)`

**Examples:**
- `id,name`
- `subject(group.name),role(name)`

Limit.description:
Limit for pagination. Controls the maximum number of items returned.
Use -1 to return all objects.

Offset.description:
Offset for offset-based pagination.
The number of items to skip before starting to return results.

limit.description: Limit of returned objects. Use -1 to return all objects.

OrderBy.description:
Sort order specification for list operations.
Use comma to separate multiple fields, prefix with '-' for descending order.

**Examples:**
- `name` - Sort by name ascending
- `-last_modified` - Sort by last_modified descending
- `name,-created` - Sort by name ascending, then created descending

enum: You do not have permission to perform this action.
Unable to delete due to workspace dependencies

id.description: UUID that uniquely identifies the role

name.description: A human readable name for the role. Must be unique within a tenant.

description.description: A description of the role to help clarify its purpose. Does not need to be unique.

permissions.description: List of permissions assigned to this role

permissions_count.description: Number of permissions assigned to this role

last_modified.description: Timestamp of when the role was last modified

id.description: UUID that uniquely identifies the resource
UUID that uniquely identifies the subject

subjects.description: Subjects to grant access to (at least one required)

id.description: UUID that uniquely identifies the role

roles.description: Roles to assign (at least one required)

RoleBindings.CreateRoleBindingsRequest.description: Request body for creating role bindings

user_count.description: Number of users in the group

resource.description: Resource the role is assigned to

inherited_from.description: Resource from which this role binding is inherited (only present when parent_role_bindings=true)

roles.description: Roles to assign (replaces existing roles for the target binding)

RoleBindings.UpdateRoleBindingsRequest.description: Request body for updating role bindings - contains the new roles to assign

ids.description: The IDs of the roles to delete. A maximum of 100 roles can be deleted in one batch.

Roles.BatchDeleteRolesRequest.description: Data for request to delete multiple roles by ID.

name.description: A human readable name for the role. Must be unique within a tenant.

description.description: A description of the role to help clarify its purpose. Does not need to be unique.

permissions.description: List of permissions to assign to this role

Roles.CreateOrUpdateRoleRequest.description: Role data for create and update operations
